info.title: WSO2 API Manager
info.description:
This document specifies a **RESTful API** for WSO2 **API Manager**.

You can find the source of this API definition 
[here](https://github.com/hevayo/restful-apim). 
It was written with [swagger 2](http://swagger.io/).

get.description: Get a list of available APIs qualifying under a given search condition.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
**Search condition**.

You can search in attributes by using an **"attribute:"** modifier.

Eg. "provider:wso2" will match an API if the provider of the API is wso2.

Supported attribute modifiers are [**version, context, status,
description, subcontext, doc, provider, tag **]

If no advanced attribute modifier has been specified, search will match the
given query string against API Name.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
** Sort expression **

A *sort expression* consists of a sequence of names of API 
properties concatenated by a '+' or '-' (indicating ascending or 
decending order) separated by a comma. The sequence of names 
corresponds to a conjunction.

200.description:
OK. 
List of qualifying APIs is returned.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

Empty body because the client has already the latest version of the requested resource.

The API Identifier and corresponding Application Identifier
the subscriptions of which are to be returned are passed as parameters.

get.description: Get a list of predefined sequences

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
**Search condition**.


You can search in attributes by using **"attribute:"** modifier.


Supported attribute modifiers are [**apiName,version**]


Eg. "apiName:phoneVerification" will match if the API Name is
phoneVerification.


If no attribute modifier is found search will match the given query string against Tag Name.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description:
Entity Tag of the response resource. 
Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

304.description:
Not Modified. 
Empty body because the client has already the latest version of the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. Requested API does not exist.

406.description: Not Acceptable. The requested media type is not supported

apiId.name: apiId
apiId.description:
**API ID** consisting of the **UUID** of the API. 
The combination of the provider of the API, name of the API and the version is also accepted as a valid API ID.
Should be formatted as **provider-name-version**.

apiId-Q.name: apiId
apiId-Q.description:
**API ID** consisting of the **UUID** of the API. 
The combination of the provider of the API, name of the API and the version is also accepted as a valid API I.
Should be formatted as **provider-name-version**.

applicationId.name: applicationId
applicationId.description: **Application Identifier** consisting of the UUID of the Application.

applicationId-Q.name: applicationId
applicationId-Q.description: **Application Identifier** consisting of the UUID of the Application.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Maximum size of resource array to return.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Starting point within the complete list of items qualified.

Accept.name: Accept
Accept.description: Media types acceptable for the response. Default is JSON.

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Media type of the entity in the body. Default is JSON.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description:
Validator for conditional requests; based on the ETag of the formerly retrieved
variant of the resourec.

If-Modified-Since.name: If-Modified-Since
If-Modified-Since.description:
Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header of the 
formerly retrieved variant of the resource.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on ETag.

If-Unmodified-Since.name: If-Unmodified-Since
If-Unmodified-Since.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header.

next.description:
Link to the next subset of resources qualified. 
Empty if no more resources are to be returned.

previous.description:
Link to the previous subset of resources qualified. 
Empty if current subset is the first subset returned.

APIInfo.title: API Info object with basic API details.

provider.description: If the provider value is not given, the user invoking the API will be used as the provider.

id.description: UUID of the api registry artifact

provider.description: If the provider value is not given user invoking the api will be used as the provider.

apiDefinition.description: Swagger definition of the API which contains details about URI templates and scopes

Link to the next subset of resources qualified. 
Empty if no more resources are to be returned.

previous.description:
Link to the previous subset of resources qualified.

subscriber.description: If subscriber is not given user invoking the API will be taken as the subscriber.

attributes.description: Custom attributes added to the tier policy

requestCount.description: Maximum number of requests which can be sent within a provided unit time

tierPlan.description: This attribute declares whether this tier is available under commercial or free

stopOnQuotaReach.description:
If this attribute is set to false, you are capabale of sending requests 
even if the request count exceeded within a unit time

Error.title: Error object returned with 4XX HTTP status

description.description: A detail description about the error message.

moreInfo.description: Preferably an url with more details about the error.

error.description:
If there are more than one error list them out. 
For example, list out validation errors by each field.

ErrorListItem.title: Description of individual errors that may have occurred during a request.

tokenScopes.description: Valid scopes for the access token

validityTime.description: Maximum validity time for the access token

supportedGrantTypes.description: Supported grant types for the application

keyState.description: State of the key generation of the application

accessAllowDomains.description: Allowed domains for the access token

scopes.description: Allowed scopes for the access token
